title: Client freezes in Draft pick whenever a timer hits zero
body:
Hello,

Recently I've updated my GPU (GTX1070)  and installed an extra monitor.

Now whenever a timer hits zero my client freezes and I cant do anything, which results in me not being able to lock in or ban, or when I've already locked in, I dont connect to the game.

Does anyone have any idea how to resolve this issue?

Thanks.

replies.body: It sounds like you might be experiencing an issue staying connected to the server and end up getting stuck.  Please go over the steps in our [Troubleshooting Connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this resolved for good.  If you still have any issues, please let me know and we can dig deeper.
